document_title: Eclampsia: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_content: M.D. Dinh Thi Hien Le recommends that pregnant women diagnosed with this syndrome as well as family members need to be equipped with knowledge and consult a doctor to have a healthy pregnancy. , safe. In case the pregnant woman has unusual signs, the family needs to take the pregnant woman immediately to a medical facility for timely diagnosis and treatment to avoid unfortunate incidents from occurring.
subsection_title: san giat.json. Care of pregnant women

san giat.json. Care of pregnant women
M.D. Dinh Thi Hien Le recommends that pregnant women diagnosed with this syndrome as well as family members need to be equipped with knowledge and consult a doctor to have a healthy pregnancy. , safe. In case the pregnant woman has unusual signs, the family needs to take the pregnant woman immediately to a medical facility for timely diagnosis and treatment to avoid unfortunate incidents from occurring.
